an3.41:4.1: “Mendicants, when three things are present, a faithful person from a good family makes much merit.
an3.41:4.4: when a gift to give is present,
an3.41:4.5: and when those worthy of a teacher’s offering are present.
an3.41:4.6: When these three things are present, a faithful person from a good family makes much merit.”
